Key Match Events: Vangelis Pavlidis scored the stoppage-time winner for Greece
Jude Bellingham scored a goal for England
Pre-Game Insights: Lee Carsley loaded his starting England XI with Jude Bellingham, Phil Foden and Cole Palmer in central areas, Bukayo Saka and Anthony Gordon on the wings
Post-Match Reflections: The Greece players dedicated their win to George Baldock, who had passed away before the match
Miscellaneous Highlights: This was Greece's first victory over England
Others: England's performance was described as a mess and lacking control and authority in midfield while they were porous at the back
